mapper.select: SELECT parking_id, parking_name, parking_address, parking_latitude, parking_longitude, parking_type FROM parking;
SELECT parking_id, parking_name, parking_address, parking_latitude, parking_longitude, parking_type FROM parking WHERE parking_id = #{parkingId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO parking (parking_name, parking_address, parking_latitude, parking_longitude, parking_type) VALUES (#{parkingName},#{parkingAddress}, #{parkingLatitude}, #{parkingLongitude}, #{parkingType});
